actions.committee: Senate Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: Senate Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: Concurrent resolution to issue a special stamp concerning free enterprise.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that the Citizens Stamp Advisory Committee of the United States Postal Service recommend to the Postmaster General that a special postage stamp be issued during 1976 commemorating 200 years of free enterprise in the United States. Directs that a copy of this resolution be sent to the Citizens Stamp Advisory Committee of the United States Postal Service.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution to issue a special stamp concerning free enterprise.
